episodes.title: Unmasking Black Axe: Inside Nigeria’s Deadliest Cult (with Charlie Northcott)
episodes.description: On today’s episode, Andy sits down with investigative journalist Charlie Northcott to expose the Black Axe, a secretive Nigerian cult that has evolved into a powerful transnational criminal network. From ritualistic violence and political corruption to global fraud and organized crime, Charlie unpacks the inner workings of this dangerous group, revealing how it operates across continents.
